articles.author: Parmita Uniyal
articles.title: 9 reasons why your little one may be coughing - Hindustan Times
articles.description: If you child is unable to get sound sleep at night and is constantly tired due to coughing or wheezing, it's time to see a doctor. Here are causes of coughing and wheezing explained by Dr Suresh Birajdar, Neonatologist & Paediatrician, Motherhood Hospital, Kh…
